participant_abstract.sent: Individual more in depth information was presented by everybody, marketing presented the preferences, ui designer showed different design options.
Ind. designer discussed the interior, workings of a remote... different options for functions and design were discussed.

participant_decisions.sent: It was decided not to use a speech recognition interface, the layout is goin to be square, simple and will incorporate a scroll wheel.

participant_problems.sent: More information non available parts and costs is required.
